document.full_text: as rebels swept across ivory coast aiming to oust the nation's strongman, laurent gbagbo, hundreds of people were killed in one town in the western part of the country last week.
document.title: hundreds killed in ivory coast town as conflict intensifies
lines_and_colors: as rebels swept across ivory coast aiming to oust the nation's strongman, laurent gbagbo, hundreds of people were killed in one town in the western part of the country last week.
